content.html: This is just one example of why it's imperative that those of us who do not believe in mythical sky wizards speak the gospel of science and humanism, with *at least* as much energy as the organised religions of this world. Apathy will not beat passion. bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-…
content.value:
This is just one example of why it's imperative that those of us who do not believe in mythical sky wizards speak the gospel of science and humanism, with *at least* as much energy as the organised religions of this world.

Apathy will not beat passion.

bbc.co.uk/news/world-us-…
